known_issues: Images in the gallery are not visible (user reported).
Build/deployment failing due to a configuration error ("Please notify the Caffeine team").

existing_features.title: Fix the Gallery page so the ambience images reliably render as thumbnails and in the lightbox by ensuring all referenced image paths point to static files that exist in the deployed frontend assets (and are served correctly in production).

Make gallery image loading robust against filename/path issues (e.g., spaces or special characters) by updating asset filenames and/or references so they work consistently across environments, and add a graceful UI fallback when an image fails to load.

new_feature_requests.summary: Investigate and fix the build/deployment configuration error so the app can build and deploy successfully without requiring manual intervention from the Caffeine team.

projectName: Fix gallery images not rendering and unblock build/deployment configuration error
